events.title: Weather tracker: Spain and Portugal hit by third deadly storm in two weeks
events.description: Storm Marta sweeps Iberian peninsula just days after Storms Kristin and Leonardo brought deadly flooding and major damage Spain and Portugal have endured another storm over the weekend, just days after the deadly flooding and major damage caused by Storm Kristin and Storm Leonardo last week. Storm Kristin killed at least five people after it made landfall on 28 January with Storm Leonardo claiming another victim last Wednesday . The outlook for this week is for more rain across Spain, Portugal and France, especially across north-west Portugal, where more than 100mm is possible during the first half of the week. events.description: Nigeria's food and drug regulator, NAFDAC, says it has resumed enforcement of a ban on alcohol sold in sachets and plastic bottles smaller than 200ml. On the ground, it's 'business as usual', consumers and sellers say.

events.title: Is Netflix making us stupid?
events.description: Netflix is increasingly designing films and series for distracted, second-screen viewers. DW's Scott Roxborough asks what it means for storytelling, visual language and the future of cinema as an art form.

events.title: Israel: Netanyahu heads to US as Iran negotiations loom
events.description: The Israeli leader will meet US President Donald Trump on Wednesday, with Washington's negotiations with Iran taking center stage.

events.title: Slovakia's embattled LGBTQ+ community hopes for change
events.description: New restrictive legislation in Slovakia comes despite rising public acceptance of same-sex couples, making the situation for the LGBTQ+ community complex and contradictory.

events.title: US: Meta, YouTube on trial over kids' social media addiction
events.description: This bellwether case in the US could reshape the design of social media for children. A plaintiff alleged that Meta and YouTube designed addictive features that harm children's mental health.

events.title: US cuts Bangladesh tariffs to 19% in trade deal
events.description: Certain textiles and garments made in Bangladesh from US-produced materials will attract zero tariffs.

events.title: US seizes sanctioned oil tanker in Indian Ocean
events.description: The Pentagon says US forces boarded a Panamanian-flagged oil tanker that attempted to evade them after departing the Caribbean. It is not entirely clear if the vessel was tied to Venezuela's shadow fleet.
events.ticker_label: ğŸ’¥ US seizes sanctioned oil tanker in Indian Ocean

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein case: Ghislaine Maxwell declines to answer questions in House deposition
events.description: Ghislaine #Maxwell invoked her Fifth Amendment right and refused to answer questions at a #US House deposition. Convicted in 2021 in the #Epstein case, she is serving a 20-year sentence as new #DOJ documents bring the case back into focus.

events.title: 'Bonaly flip': Olympic skating backflip sparks tributes to French trailblazer
events.description: US figure skater Ilia Malinin's gold-medal-clinching backflip at the Winter Olympics in Milan-Cortina has prompted a flurry of tributes to France's Surya Bonaly, who became the first skater to land the daring flip on one skate at the Nagano Games almost three decades ago â€“ when the move was still forbidden.

events.title: Have a baby while you still can, France to tell 29-year-olds
events.description: All 29-year-old French citizens are to be encouraged by their government to have babies while they still can.

events.title: Irish man detained for months in 'concentration camp' by ICE
events.description: An Irishman who has been detained by ICE for five months has described the facilities as "like a modern-day concentration camp".

events.title: Social media goes on trial in LA - here's what you need to know
events.description: Social media is on trial in Los Angeles. What happens next could change the way they operate.

events.title: EU drafts a list of concessions it says Russia must make to secure real peace in Ukraine
events.description: The European Union is drafting a list of concessions it believes Russia must make for long-term peace to be achieved in Ukraine

events.title: South Korea will boost medical school admissions to tackle physician shortage
events.description: South Korea plans to increase medical school admissions by over 3,340 students from 2027 to 2031 to address physician shortages

events.title: Russia thinks it can outsmart the US during Ukraine talks, intelligence chief says
events.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin shows no desire to end Russiaâ€™s invasion of Ukraine, according to a senior European intelligence official

events.title: Misery deepens in the West Bank as Israel provides few Palestinian work permits
events.description: Many Palestinians in the occupied West Bank are struggling to get by after losing their permits to work inside Israel

events.title: Meet Chile's first rugby team created inside a prison
events.description: Chile's first prison rugby team is transforming lives at the ValparaÃ­so Penitentiary Complex

events.title: Air Canada suspends flights to Cuba because of aviation fuel shortage
events.description: Air Canada said Monday it is suspending service to Cuba because of a shortage of aviation fuel on the island

events.title: DR Congo: UN vows orderly peacekeeping transition as South Africa withdraws troops
events.description: South Africa has moved to withdraw its peacekeepers deployed at the United Nations Organization Stabilization Mission in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (MONUSCO) after nearly three decades of service.

events.title: Fatwas, faith and fallacies: Myth-busting female genital mutilation in Africa
events.description: Olivia Albert, 19, was subjected to female genital (FGM) mutilation when she was 14. She told the UN sexual and reproductive health agency (UNFPA) that she hid her pain because everyone around her said it was normal.

events.title: Minnesota woman sentenced to prison for $325K SNAP fraud scheme
events.description: A Minnesota woman was sentenced to prison for $325,000 SNAP fraud scheme involving fake identities and pregnancy claims to steal government benefits illegally.

events.title: Nancy Guthrie's church prays God would 'guide the authorities' in search
events.description: Nancy Guthrie's Arizona church prayed for her safe return on Sunday, as Savannah Guthrie and other family members addressed alleged kidnappers in a video.

events.title: Bad Bunny's halftime show ripped for suspected political message and more top headlines
events.description: No description available.

events.title: Venezuelan opposition leader seized by armed men after being released from jail
events.description: MarÃ­a Corina Machado said Venezuelan opposition leader Juan Pablo Guanipa was seized by armed men in Caracas after his release from prison.

events.title: Japan's 'Iron Lady' thanks Trump as party secures historic supermajority
events.description: Japan's Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi wins historic supermajority in snap election, earning Trump's praise for her "landslide victory" and conservative agenda.

events.title: Keir Starmerâ€™s chief of staff resigns after recommending Epstein-connected ambassador
events.description: Morgan McSweeney resigns as Starmer's chief of staff amid criticism over Peter Mandelson's UK ambassador appointment linked to Jeffrey Epstein connections.

events.title: Trump's special envoy Witkoff and Kushner visit US aircraft carrier amid Iran tensions, talks
events.description: Trump envoy Witkoff and Jared Kushner visited the USS Abraham Lincoln amid Iran tensions as Netanyahu prepares a Washington meeting to discuss limiting Tehran's ballistic missiles.

events.title: Iran's Khamenei stays away from talks as JD Vance says dynamic makes diplomacy 'much more complicated'
events.description: Vice President JD Vance calls Iran diplomacy "bizarre" as Supreme Leader Khamenei stays away from negotiations starting starting on Friday in Oman, complicating U.S.-Iran talks.
